classification.task_goal: Convert a numpy integer array to an image using a tile map and display it in a Jupyter notebook.
primary_constraints: The integer values in the array must correspond to valid indices in the tile map.
The resulting image must be displayed correctly without being all white.
classification.reasoning: The assistant initially provided code that resulted in an all-white image due to incorrect handling of the integer array and tile mapping. The user identified the issue and made adjustments to the code, successfully repairing the task constraints. However, there were still issues with the rotation of the image, indicating some ongoing constraint drift.
